# useMediaTrackByName

{% callout type="caution" variation="normal" %}

This API is deprecated:

This function will be removed in a future version, use `useTrackByName` instead.

{% /callout %}

## Import

```typescript
import { useMediaTrackByName } from "@livekit/components-react";
```
